metadata.title: CVE-2024-27077 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: v4l2-mem2mem: fix a memleak in v4l2_m2m_register_entityThe entity->name (i.e. name) is allocated in v4l2_m2m_register_entitybut isn't freed in its following error-handling paths. This patchadds such deallocation to prevent memleak of entity->name.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
